price: То је дан истине, па ко хоће, кренуће путем повратка своме Господару.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-yawmu al-ḥaqu faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi maāban
